00033         public function removeUploadedFile($fieldname,$filename) {
00034                 if(!t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax')) {
00035                         return;
00036                                 
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 // Instantiate the tx_xajax_response object
00040                 require (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('xajax') . 'class.tx_xajax.php');
00041 
00042                 $objResponse = new tx_xajax_response();
00043 
00044                 session_start();
00045 
00046                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00047                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00048 
00049                                 if(!strcmp($field,$fieldname)) {
00050                                         foreach($files as $key=>&$fileInfo) {
00051                                                 if(!strcmp($fileInfo['uploaded_name'],$filename)) {
00052                                                         unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]);
00053                                                 }
00054                                         }
00055                                 }
00056                         }
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 // Add the content to or Result Box: #formResult
00060                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00061                         $markers = array();
00062                         $this->fillFileMarkers($markers);
00063                         $content = $markers['###'.$fieldname.'_uploadedFiles###'];
00064                         $objResponse->addAssign("F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_".$fieldname, "innerHTML", $content);
00065                                 
00066                 } else {
00067                         $objResponse->addAssign("F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_".$fieldname, "innerHTML", "");
00068                 }
00069 
00070                 //return the XML response
00071                 return $objResponse->getXML();
00072         }

00082         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00083 
00084 
00085                 session_start();
00086 
00087                 //set GET/POST parameters
00088                 $this->gp = $gp;
00089 
00090                 //set template
00091                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00092 
00093                 //set settings
00094                 $this->settings = $this->parseSettings();
00095 
00096                 $this->errors = $errors;
00097 
00098                 //set language file
00099                 if(!$this->langFile) {
00100                         $this->readLangFile();
00101                 }
00102 
00103 
00104                 if(!$this->gp['submitted']) {
00105                         $this->storeStartEndBlock();
00106                 } else {
00107                         $this->fillStartEndBlock();
00108                 }
00109                 
00110                 //substitute ISSET markers
00111                 $this->substituteIssetSubparts();
00112 
00113                 //fill Typoscript markers
00114                 if(is_array($this->settings['markers.'])) {
00115                         $this->fillTypoScriptMarkers();
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 //fill default markers
00119                 $this->fillDefaultMarkers();
00120 
00121                 //fill value_[fieldname] markers
00122                 $this->fillValueMarkers();
00123 
00124                 //fill selected_[fieldname]_value markers and checked_[fieldname]_value markers
00125                 $this->fillSelectedMarkers();
00126 
00127                 //fill LLL:[language_key] markers
00128                 $this->fillLangMarkers();
00129 
00130                 #print_r($this->template);
00131 
00132                 //fill error_[fieldname] markers
00133                 if(!empty($errors)) {
00134                         $this->fillErrorMarkers($errors);
00135                         $this->fillIsErrorMarkers($errors);
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00139                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($this->template);
00140 
00141 
00142                 return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00143         }
00144 
00150         protected function readLangFile() {
00151                 if(is_array($this->settings['langFile.'])) {
00152                         $this->langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['langFile'],$this->settings['langFile.']);
00153                 } else {
00154                         $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($this->settings['langFile']);
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         
00165         protected function markersCountAsSet($conditionValue) {
00166 
00167                 // Find first || or && or !
00168                 $pattern = '/(_*([A-Za-z0-9]+)_*(\|\||&&)_*([^_]+)_*)|(_*(!)_*([A-Za-z0-9]+))/';
00169                 
00170                 session_start();
00171                 // recurse if there are more
00172                 if( preg_match($pattern, $conditionValue, $matches) ){
00173                         $isset = isset($this->gp[$matches[2]]);
00174                         if($matches[3] == '||' && $isset) {
00175                                 $return = true;
00176                         } elseif($matches[3] == '||' && !$isset) {
00177                                 $return = $this->markersCountAsSet($matches[4]);
00178                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && $isset) {
00179                                 $return = $this->markersCountAsSet($matches[4]);
00180                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && !$isset) {
00181                                 $return = false;
00182                         } elseif($matches[6] == '!' && !$isset) {
00183                                 return !(isset($this->gp[$matches[7]]) && $this->gp[$matches[7]] != '');
00184                         } elseif($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] == 1) {
00185                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('invalid_isset',$matches[2]);
00186                         }
00187                 } else {
00188 
00189                         // end of recursion
00190                         
00191                         $return = isset($this->gp[$conditionValue]) && ($this->gp[$conditionValue] != '');
00192                 }
00193                 return $return;
00194         }
00195         
00202         protected function substituteIssetSubparts(){
00203                 $flags = array();
00204                 $nowrite = false;
00205                 $out = array();
00206                 foreach(split(chr(10), $this->template) as $line){
00207 
00208                         // works only on it's own line
00209                         $pattern = '/###isset_+([^#]*)_*###/i';
00210 
00211                         // set for odd ISSET_xyz, else reset
00212                         if(preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches)) {
00213                                 if(!$flags[$matches[1]]) { // set
00214                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = true;
00215 
00216                                         // set nowrite flag if required until the next ISSET_xyz
00217                                         // (only if not already set by envelop)
00218                                         if((!$this->markersCountAsSet($matches[1])) && (!$nowrite)) {
00219                                                 $nowrite = $matches[1];
00220                                         }
00221                                 } else { // close it
00222                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = false;
00223                                         if($nowrite == $matches[1]) {
00224                                                 $nowrite = 0;
00225                                         }
00226                                 }
00227                         } else { // It is no ISSET_line. Write if permission is given.
00228                                 if(!$nowrite) {
00229                                         $out[] = $line;
00230                                 }
00231                         }
00232                 }
00233 
00234                 $out = implode(chr(10),$out);
00235                 
00236                 $this->template = $out;
00237         }
00238 
00245         protected function storeStartEndBlock() {
00246                 session_start();
00247                 if(!isset($_SESSION['startblock']) || empty($_SESSION['startblock'])) {
00248                         $_SESSION['startblock'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###FORM_STARTBLOCK###');
00249                 }
00250                 if(!isset($_SESSION['endblock']) || empty($_SESSION['endblock'])) {
00251                         $_SESSION['endblock'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###FORM_ENDBLOCK###');
00252                 }
00253         }
00254 
00260         protected function fillStartEndBlock() {
00261                 session_start();
00262                 $markers = array (
00263                         '###FORM_STARTBLOCK###' => $_SESSION['startblock'],
00264                         '###FORM_ENDBLOCK###' => $_SESSION['endblock']
00265                 );
00266 
00267                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00268         }

00275         protected function parseSettings() {
00276                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00277                 if(is_array($this->settings)) {
00278                         return $this->settings;
00279                 }
00280                 if($this->predefined) {
00281                         $settings = $settings['predef.'][$this->predefined];
00282                 }
00283                 session_start();
00284                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']) {
00285                         $settings = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'];
00286                 }
00287                 return $settings;
00288         }

00298         protected function fillSelectedMarkers() {
00299                 if (is_array($this->gp)) {
00300                         foreach($this->gp as $k=>$v) {
00301                                 if (is_array($v)) {
00302                                         foreach ($v as $field=>$value) {
00303                                                 $markers['###checked_'.$k.'_'.$value.'###'] = 'checked="checked"';
00304                                                 $markers['###selected_'.$k.'_'.$value.'###'] = 'selected="selected"';
00305                                         }
00306                                 } else {
00307                                         $markers['###checked_'.$k.'_'.$v.'###'] = 'checked="checked"';
00308                                         $markers['###selected_'.$k.'_'.$v.'###'] = 'selected="selected"';
00309                                 }
00310                         }
00311                         $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00312                 }
00313         }
00314 
00320         protected function fillDefaultMarkers() {
00321                 $settings = $this->parseSettings();
00322                 $parameters = t3lib_div::_GET();
00323                 if (isset($parameters['id'])) {
00324                         unset($parameters['id']);
00325                 }
00326                 $path = $this->pi_getPageLink($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id, '',$parameters);
00327                 $markers = array();
00328                 $markers['###REL_URL###'] = $path;
00329                 $markers['###ABS_URL###'] = t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl('').$path;
00330                 $name = "step-1";
00331                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00332                         $name = $settings['formValuesPrefix']."[".$name."]";
00333                 }
00334                 $markers['###submit_reload###'] = ' name="'.$name.'" ';
00335                 $this->fillCaptchaMarkers($markers);
00336                 $this->fillFEUserMarkers($markers);
00337                 $this->fillFileMarkers($markers);
00338                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00339         }

00347         protected function fillCaptchaMarkers(&$markers) {
00348                 global $LANG;
00349                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('captcha')){
00350                         $markers["###CAPTCHA###"] = '<img src="'.t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath('captcha').'captcha/captcha.php" alt="" />';
00351                         $markers["###captcha###"] = $markers['###CAPTCHA###'];
00352                 }
00353                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('simple_captcha')) {
00354                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('simple_captcha', 'class.tx_simplecaptcha.php'));
00355                         $simpleCaptcha_className = t3lib_div::makeInstanceClassName('tx_simplecaptcha');
00356                         $this->simpleCaptcha = new $simpleCaptcha_className();
00357                         $captcha = $this->simpleCaptcha->getCaptcha();
00358                         $markers["###simple_captcha###"] = $captcha;
00359                         $markers["###SIMPLE_CAPTCHA###"] = $captcha;
00360                 }
00361                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('sr_freecap')){
00362                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('sr_freecap').'pi2/class.tx_srfreecap_pi2.php');
00363                         $this->freeCap = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_srfreecap_pi2');
00364                         $markers = array_merge($markers,$this->freeCap->makeCaptcha());
00365                 }
00366                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('jm_recaptcha')) {
00367                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('jm_recaptcha')."class.tx_jmrecaptcha.php");
00368                         $this->recaptcha = new tx_jmrecaptcha();
00369                         $markers["###RECAPTCHA###"] = $this->recaptcha->getReCaptcha();
00370                         $markers["###recaptcha###"] = $markers['###RECAPTCHA###'];
00371                 }
00372 
00373                 if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('wt_calculating_captcha')) {
00374                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('wt_calculating_captcha').'class.tx_wtcalculatingcaptcha.php');
00375 
00376                         $captcha = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_wtcalculatingcaptcha');
00377 
00378                         $markers["###WT_CALCULATING_CAPTCHA###"] = $captcha->generateCaptcha();
00379                         $markers["###wt_calculating_captcha###"] = $markers['###WT_CALCULATING_CAPTCHA###'];
00380                 }
00381 
00382                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('mailformplusplus')."Resources/PHP/mathguard/ClassMathGuard.php");
00383                 $langFile = "EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang.xml";
00384                 $question = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':mathguard_question'));
00385                 $markers["###MATHGUARD###"] = MathGuard::returnQuestion($question,"red");
00386                 $markers["###mathguard###"] = $markers["###MATHGUARD###"];
00387         }

00395         protected function fillFEUserMarkers(&$markers) {
00396                 if (is_array($GLOBALS["TSFE"]->fe_user->user)) {
00397                         foreach($GLOBALS["TSFE"]->fe_user->user as $k=>$v) {
00398                                 $markers['###FEUSER_'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $v;
00399                                 $markers['###FEUSER_'.strtolower($k).'###'] = $v;
00400                                 $markers['###feuser_'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $v;
00401                                 $markers['###feuser_'.strtolower($k).'###'] = $v;
00402                         }
00403                 }
00404         }

00422         protected function fillFileMarkers(&$markers) {
00423                 session_start();
00424                 $settings = $this->parseSettings();
00425 
00426                 $flexformValue = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],'required_fields','sMISC');
00427                 if($flexformValue) {
00428                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$flexformValue);
00429 
00430                         if(is_array($settings['validators.'])) {
00431                                 
00432                                 // Searches the index of F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default
00433                                 foreach ($settings['validators.'] as $index => $validator) {
00434                                         if ($validator['class'] == 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default') {
00435                                                 break;
00436                                         }
00437                                 }
00438                         } else {
00439                                 $index = 1;
00440                         }
00441 
00442                         // Adds the value.
00443                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00444                                 $settings['validators.'][$index . '.']['config.']['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.'] = array();
00445                                 $settings['validators.'][$index . '.']['config.']['fieldConf.'][$field."."]['errorCheck.']['1'] = "required";
00446                         }
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 //parse validation settings
00450                 if(is_array($settings['validators.'])) {
00451                         foreach($settings['validators.'] as $key=>$validatorSettings) {
00452                                 if(is_array($validatorSettings['config.']['fieldConf.'])) {
00453                                         foreach($validatorSettings['config.']['fieldConf.'] as $fieldname=>$fieldSettings) {
00454                                                 if(is_array($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'])) {
00455                                                         foreach($fieldSettings['errorCheck.'] as $key=>$check) {
00456                                                                 switch($check) {
00457                                                                         case "fileMinSize":
00458                                                                                 $minSize = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['minSize'];
00459                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_minSize###"] = t3lib_div::formatSize($minSize,' Bytes | KB | MB | GB');
00460                                                                                 break;
00461                                                                         case "fileMaxSize":
00462                                                                                 $maxSize = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['maxSize'];
00463                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_maxSize###"] = t3lib_div::formatSize($maxSize,' Bytes | KB | MB | GB');
00464                                                                                 break;
00465                                                                         case "fileAllowedTypes":
00466                                                                                 $types = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['allowedTypes'];
00467                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_allowedTypes###"] = $types;
00468                                                                                 break;
00469                                                                         case "fileMaxCount":
00470                                                                                 $maxCount = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['maxCount'];
00471                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_maxCount###"] = $maxCount;
00472                                                                                         
00473                                                                                 $fileCount = count($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][str_replace(".","",$fieldname)]);
00474                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_fileCount###"] = $fileCount;
00475                                                                                         
00476                                                                                 $remaining = $maxCount - $fileCount;
00477                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_remainingCount###"] = $remaining;
00478                                                                                 break;
00479                                                                         case "fileMinCount":
00480                                                                                 $maxCount = $fieldSettings['errorCheck.'][$key."."]['minCount'];
00481                                                                                 $markers["###".str_replace(".","",$fieldname)."_minCount###"] = $minCount;
00482                                                                                 break;
00483                                                                         case "required":
00484                                                                                 $markers['###required_'.str_replace(".","",$fieldname).'###'] = (isset($settings['requiredSign']))?$settings['requiredSign']:"*";
00485                                                                                 break;
00486                                                                 }
00487                                                         }
00488                                                 }
00489                                         }
00490                                 }
00491                         }
00492                 }
00493                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'])) {
00494                         $singleWrap = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00495                         $totalMarkerSingleWrap = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00496                         $totalWrap = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00497                         $totalMarkersTotalWrap = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00498                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00499                                 foreach($files as $fileInfo) {
00500                                         $filename = $fileInfo['name'];
00501                                         $thumb = '';
00502                                         if($settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['showThumbnails'] == '1') {
00503                                                 $imgConf['image'] = 'IMAGE';
00504                                                 $imgConf['image.']['altText'] = $filename;
00505                                                 $imgConf['image.']['titleText'] = $filename;
00506 
00507                                                 $relPath = substr($fileInfo['uploaded_folder'].$filename,1);
00508                                                 $imgConf['image.']['file'] = $relPath;
00509                                                 if($settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailWidth']) {
00510                                                         $imgConf['image.']['file.']['width'] = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailWidth'];
00511                                                 }
00512                                                 if($settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailHeight']) {
00513                                                         $imgConf['image.']['file.']['height'] = $settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailHeight'];
00514                                                 }
00515                                                 $thumb = $this->cObj->IMAGE($imgConf['image.']);
00516                                         }
00517                                         if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax') && $settings['files.']['enableAjaxFileRemoval']) {
00518                                                 $filename .= '<a href="javascript:void(0)" class="mailformplusplus_removelink" onclick="xajax_'.$this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile(\''.$field.'\',\''.$fileInfo['uploaded_name'].'\')">X</a>';
00519                                                 $thumb .= '<a href="javascript:void(0)" class="mailformplusplus_removelink" onclick="xajax_'.$this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile(\''.$field.'\',\''.$fileInfo['uploaded_name'].'\')">X</a>';
00520                                         }
00521                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00522                                                 $wrappedFilename = str_replace("|",$filename,$singleWrap);
00523                                                 $wrappedThumb = str_replace("|",$thumb,$singleWrap);
00524                                         } else {
00525                                                 $wrappedFilename = $filename;
00526                                                 $wrappedThumb = $thumb;
00527                                         }
00528                                         if($settings['singleFileMarkerTemplate.']['showThumbnails'] == '1') {
00529                                                 $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedThumb;
00530                                         } else {
00531                                                 $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedFilename;
00532                                         }
00533                                                 
00534                                         if($settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['showThumbnails'] == '1') {
00535                                                 $imgConf['image'] = 'IMAGE';
00536                                                 $imgConf['image.']['altText'] = $filename;
00537                                                 $imgConf['image.']['titleText'] = $filename;
00538 
00539                                                 $relPath = substr($fileInfo['uploaded_folder'].$filename,1);
00540                                                 $imgConf['image.']['file'] = $relPath;
00541                                                 if($settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailWidth']) {
00542                                                         $imgConf['image.']['file.']['width'] = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailWidth'];
00543                                                 }
00544                                                 if($settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailHeight']) {
00545                                                         $imgConf['image.']['file.']['height'] = $settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['thumbnailHeight'];
00546                                                 }
00547                                                 $thumb = $this->cObj->IMAGE($imgConf['image.']);
00548                                         }
00549                                                 
00550                                         if(strlen($totalMarkerSingleWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalMarkerSingleWrap,"|")) {
00551 
00552                                                 $wrappedFilename = str_replace("|",$filename,$totalMarkerSingleWrap);
00553                                                 $wrappedThumb = str_replace("|",$thumb,$totalMarkerSingleWrap);
00554                                         } else {
00555                                                 $wrappedFilename = $filename;
00556                                                 $wrappedThumb = $thumb;
00557                                         }
00558                                                 
00559                                         if($settings['totalFilesMarkerTemplate.']['showThumbnails'] == '1') {
00560                                                 $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedThumb;
00561                                         } else {
00562                                                 $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'] .= $wrappedFilename;
00563                                         }
00564                                                 
00565                                                 
00566                                 }
00567                                 if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00568                                         $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'],$totalWrap);
00569                                 }
00570                                 $markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'] = '<div id="F3_MailformPlusPlus_UploadedFiles_'.$field.'">'.$markers['###'.$field.'_uploadedFiles###'].'</div>';
00571                         }
00572                         if(strlen($totalMarkersTotalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalMarkersTotalWrap,"|")) {
00573                                 $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'],$totalMarkersTotalWrap);
00574                         }
00575                         $markers['###TOTAL_UPLOADEDFILES###'] = $markers['###total_uploadedFiles###'];
00576                 }
00577         }
00578         
00587         protected function fillIsErrorMarkers(&$errors) {
00588                 $markers = array();
00589                 foreach($errors as $field=>$types) {
00590                         if(strlen(trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error_'.$field))) > 0) {
00591                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error_'.$field));
00592                         } elseif (strlen(trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error'))) > 0) {
00593                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error'));
00594                         } elseif($this->settings['isErrorMarker.'][$field]) {
00595                                 if($this->settings['isErrorMarker.'][$field.'.']) {
00596                                         $errorMessage = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['isErrorMarker.'][$field],$this->settings['isErrorMarker.'][$field.'.']);
00597                                 } else {
00598                                         $errorMessage = $this->settings['isErrorMarker.'][$field];
00599                                 }
00600                         } elseif($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global']) {
00601                                 if($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global.']) {
00602                                         $errorMessage = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global'],$this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global.']);
00603                                 } else {
00604                                         $errorMessage = $this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global'];
00605                                 }
00606                         }
00607                         $markers['###is_error_'.$field.'###'] = $errorMessage;
00608                 }
00609                 if (strlen(trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error'))) > 0) {
00610                         $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':is_error'));
00611                 } elseif($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global']) {
00612                         if($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global.']) {
00613                                 $errorMessage = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global'],$this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global.']);
00614                         } else {
00615                                 $errorMessage = $this->settings['isErrorMarker.']['global'];
00616                         }
00617                 }
00618                 $markers['###is_error###'] = $errorMessage;
00619                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00620         }
00621 
00630         protected function fillErrorMarkers(&$errors) {
00631                 $markers = array();
00632                 $singleWrap = $this->settings['singleErrorTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00633                 foreach($errors as $field=>$types) {
00634                         $errorMessages = array();
00635                         $clearErrorMessages = array();
00636                         if(strlen(trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field))) > 0) {
00637                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field));
00638                                 if($errorMessage) {
00639                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00640                                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$singleWrap);
00641                                         }
00642                                                 
00643                                         $errorMessages[] = $errorMessage;
00644                                 }
00645                         }
00646                         if(!is_array($types)) {
00647                                 $types = array($types);
00648                         }
00649                         foreach($types as $type) {
00650 
00651                                 $temp = explode(";",$type);
00652                                 $type = array_shift($temp);
00653                                 foreach($temp as $item) {
00654                                         $item = explode("::",$item);
00655                                         $values[$item[0]] = $item[1];
00656                                 }
00657 
00658                                 //try to load specific error message with key like error_fieldname_integer
00659                                 $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field.'_'.$type));
00660                                 if(strlen($errorMessage) == 0) {
00661                                         $type = strtolower($type);
00662                                         $errorMessage = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':error_'.$field.'_'.$type));
00663                                 }
00664                                 if($errorMessage) {
00665                                         if(is_array($values)) {
00666                                                 foreach($values as $key=>$value) {
00667                                                         $errorMessage = str_replace("###".$key."###",$value,$errorMessage);
00668                                                 }
00669                                         }
00670                                         if(strlen($singleWrap) > 0 && strstr($singleWrap,"|")) {
00671                                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$singleWrap);
00672                                         }
00673                                         $errorMessages[] = $errorMessage;
00674                                 } else {
00675                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('no_error_message','error_'.$field.'_'.$type);
00676                                 }
00677                         }
00678                         $errorMessage = implode("",$errorMessages);
00679                         $totalWrap = $this->settings['singleErrorTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00680                         if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00681                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$totalWrap);
00682                         }
00683                         $clearErrorMessage = $errorMessage;
00684                         if($this->settings['addErrorAnchors']) {
00685                                 $errorMessage = '<a name="'.$field.'">'.$errorMessage.'</a>';
00686 
00687                         }
00688                         $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($errorMessage,$this->langFile);
00689                         $errorMessage = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($errorMessage, $langMarkers);
00690                         $markers['###error_'.$field.'###'] = $errorMessage;
00691                         $markers['###ERROR_'.strtoupper($field).'###'] = $errorMessage;
00692                         $errorMessage = $clearErrorMessage;
00693                         if($this->settings['addErrorAnchors']) {
00694                                 $errorMessage = '<a href="' . t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REQUEST_URI') . '#'.$field.'">'.$errorMessage.'</a>';
00695 
00696                         }
00697                         //list settings
00698                         $listSingleWrap = $this->settings['errorListTemplate.']['singleWrap'];
00699                         if(strlen($listSingleWrap) > 0 && strstr($listSingleWrap,"|")) {
00700                                 $errorMessage = str_replace("|",$errorMessage,$listSingleWrap);
00701                         }
00702                                 
00703                         $markers['###ERROR###'] .= $errorMessage;
00704                 }
00705                 $totalWrap = $this->settings['errorListTemplate.']['totalWrap'];
00706                 if(strlen($totalWrap) > 0 && strstr($totalWrap,"|")) {
00707                         $markers['###ERROR###'] = str_replace("|",$markers['###ERROR###'],$totalWrap);
00708                 }
00709                 $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($markers['###ERROR###'],$this->langFile);
00710                 $markers['###ERROR###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($markers['###ERROR###'], $langMarkers);
00711                 $markers['###error###'] = $markers['###ERROR###'];
00712                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00713         }
00714 
00720         protected function fillTypoScriptMarkers() {
00721                 $markers = array();
00722                 foreach($this->settings['markers.'] as $name=>$options) {
00723                         
00724                         if(!strstr($name,".")) {
00725                                 if(!strcmp($options,"USER") || !strcmp($options,"USER_INT")) {
00726                                         $this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']['gp'] = $this->gp;
00727                                         //$markers['###'.$name.'###'] = t3lib_div::callUserFunction($this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']['userFunc'],$this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.'],$this,"");
00728                                 } // else {
00729                                 $markers['###'.$name.'###'] = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['markers.'][$name],$this->settings['markers.'][$name.'.']);
00730                                 //}
00731                         }
00732                 }
00733                 
00734                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00735         }
00736 
00747         protected function fillValueMarkers() {
00748                 $markers = array();
00749                 if (is_array($this->gp)) {
00750                         foreach($this->gp as $k=>$v) {
00751                                 if (!ereg('EMAIL_', $k)) {
00752                                         if (is_array($v)) {
00753                                                 $v = implode(',', $v);
00754                                         }
00755                                         $v = trim($v);
00756                                         if ($v != "") {
00757                                                 if(get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00758                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = stripslashes(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v));
00759                                                 } else {
00760                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v);
00761                                                 }
00762                                         } else {
00763                                                 $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = '';
00764                                         }
00765                                         $markers['###'.$k.'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00766                                         $markers['###'.strtoupper($k).'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00767                                         $markers['###'.strtoupper("VALUE_".$k).'###'] = $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'];
00768                                 } //if end
00769                         } // foreach end
00770                 } // if end
00771                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00772 
00773                 //remove remaining VALUE_-markers
00774                 //needed for nested markers like ###LLL:tx_myextension_table.field1.i.###value_field1###### to avoid wrong marker removal if field1 isn't set
00775                 $this->template = preg_replace('/###value_.*?###/i', '', $this->template);
00776         }
00777 
00785         protected function fillLangMarkers() {
00786                 global $LANG;
00787                 $langMarkers = array();
00788                 if ($this->langFile != '') {
00789                         $aLLMarkerList = array();
00790                         preg_match_all('/###LLL:.+?###/Ssm', $this->template, $aLLMarkerList);
00791                         foreach($aLLMarkerList[0] as $LLMarker){
00792                                 $llKey = substr($LLMarker,7,strlen($LLMarker)-10);
00793                                 $marker = $llKey;
00794                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'] = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'.$llKey));
00795                         }
00796                 }
00797                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $langMarkers);
00798         }
00799 }
